richtext.name: n1
richtext.text: In normal games, when 3 or more appear on the reels, the bonus game can be triggered. After triggering the bonus game, there are initially 3 spins. During the spinning process, each time a new appears on the reel, the remaining number of spins will be reset to 3. The game ends when the reels are full of or the number of spins runs out.
